description: Amendments to the orientation of the acoustic enclosure and stair access on the roof of the ground floor rear extension, reconfiguration of the louvre within the first floor window on the eastern elevation and change to the materials of gate as a variation to condition 3 (approved plans) and condition 7 (details of gates) of planning permission ref 2022/0342/P dated 12/10/2022 as amended by a variation to 2021/1150/P dated 05/10/2021 (External alterations to the existing building including new rooflights and 4 air conditioning units with lowering of the roof of no. 7 Warner Yard, 4 air conditioning units with associated timber enclosure within the courtyard, replacement windows, creation of new entrance on Vine Hill and Warner Yard, enlargement of existing lower ground and upper ground floor openings on the Vine Hill, Warner Yard and courtyard elevations, infilling of lightwell and installation of pavement lights fronting Rosebery Avenue, creation of bin store area to main entrances, new cycle parking, landscaping of the courtyard and other minor works)
